QAs.question: Who are the sponsors of the 2023 ACM SIGMOD/PODS?
QAs.answer: The Diamond Sponsor of the 2023 ACM SIGMOD/PODS is Amazon. The Platinum Sponsors include Databricks, confluent, salesforce, Alibaba Cloud, Apple, Google and Microsoft. The Platinum Sponsors include Databricks, confluent, salesforce, Alibaba Cloud, Apple, Google and Microsoft. The Gold Sponsors include ebay, Meta, HUAWEI, ORACLE, Snowflake, ByteDance, OCEANBASE and Celonis. The silver sponsors include MotherDuck, SingleStore, CockroachDB, Aerospike, Megagon Labs, CelerData and Undo. The Diversity & Inclusion Sponsors are Amazon and Microsoft. The Student Travel Award Sponsor is NSF

QAs.question: Who are the chairs of the 2023 ACM SIGMOD/PODS?
QAs.answer: The SIGMOD General Co-chairs are Sudipto Das and Ippokratis Pandis. The SIGMOD Program Co-chairs are K. Selcuk Candan and Sihem Amer-Yahia. The PODS General Chair is Floris Geerts. The PODS Program Chair is Hung Ngo.

QAs.question: What are all the sponsorship levels?
QAs.answer: There are Diamond Sponsor, Platinum Sponsor, Gold Sponsor and Silver Sponsor.

QAs.question: What are all the Publishers/Exhibitors Levels?
QAs.answer: There are Platinum, Gold and Silver.

QAs.question: Who are the members of the Chairs of the SIGMOD Availability & Reproducibility Organization?
QAs.answer: Manos Athanassoulis and Holger Pirk.

QAs.question: Who are the members of the Advisory Committee of the SIGMOD Availability & Reproducibility Organization?
QAs.answer: Juliana Freire, Stratos Idreos and Dennis Shasha.

QAs.question: Who are the members of the Awards Committee of the SIGMOD Availability & Reproducibility Organization?
QAs.answer: Dennis Shasha (chair), Asterios Katsifodimos, Torsten Grust and Juan Lastra-Díaz.

QAs.question: Who are the members of the SIGMOD General Chairs?
QAs.answer: Sudipto Das and Ippokratis Pandis.

QAs.question: Who are the members of the SIGMOD Proceedings Chairs?
QAs.answer: Zhichao Cao and Juan Lastra-Díaz.

QAs.question: How large of logos can sponsors display on the conference banner/kiosk for each sponsorship level?
QAs.answer: Diamond Sponsors can display extra-large logos. Platinum Sponsors can display large logos. Gold Sponsors can display medium logos. Silver Sponsors can display small logos.

QAs.question: What are the stages of the Student Research Competition?
QAs.answer: The stages of the Student Research Competition include the first round, which is the abstract submission; the second round, which is the poster presentation; the third round, which is the research talk; and the grand finals.
QAs.from: SIGMOD2023/Special and Co-located Events/Student Research Competition/The Competition

QAs.question: What are the dates of the affiliated workshops?
QAs.answer: Sunday, June 18, 2023; Monday, June 19, 2023; and Friday, June 23, 2023.

QAs.question: What are the important dates of the Programming Contest for April 2023
QAs.answer: The final submission deadline is April 15, 2023 (Eastern Standard Time), and the finalists will be notified on April 20, 2023.
QAs.from: SIGMOD2023/Special and Co-located Events/Programming Contest/Important Dates

QAs.question: What are the popular dining recommendations around the Lincoln Square?
QAs.answer: There are Ascend Prime Steak & Sushi, Cantina Monarca, Din Tai Fung, Duke’s Seafood, Forum Social House and TopGolf, Lucky Strike, STK Steakhouse and Japonessa Sushi Cocina.
QAs.from: SIGMOD2023/Participant Information/Restaurants/Lincoln Square Dining Options (connected via skyway)/Popular recommendations

QAs.question: What are all the sessions in PODS's Research Sessions?
QAs.answer: There are Session 1: Test of Time Awards and Gems of PODS, Session 2: Query Languages & Transaction Processing, Session 3: Awards (Best Paper and Distinguished Papers), Session 4: Sampling and Streaming, Session 5: Differential privacy & distributed processing, Session 6: Queries and Graphs, Session 7: Query Processing and Session 8: Uncertainty.

QAs.question: Who are the keynote speakers for the 2023 ACM SIGMOD/PODS?
QAs.answer: The keynote speakers are Don Chamberlin, Vanessa Murdock, Shazia Sadiq and Shazia Sadiq.

QAs.question: How and when can I register for the 2023 ACM SIGMOD/PODS?
QAs.answer: You can register through https://cvent.me/KXy4Qr. Make sure you register before the deadline June 12th at 11:45 pm.

QAs.question: How much does an ACM student member have to pay if the student registers for the full conference during the Early Bird period?
How much does an ACM professional member have to pay if the member registers for the full conference after June 11, 2023?
Where can I browse papers related to this conference after the conference?
QAs.answer: PACMMOD V1 publication containing peer reviewed research track and industrial papers can be accessed through https://dl.acm.org/journal/pacmmod. The companion proceeding containing all other contributions can be accessed through https://dl.acm.org/doi/proceedings/10.1145/3555041.

QAs.question: What are the special and co-located events organized alongside the conference?
QAs.answer: Student Research Competition, Affiliated Workshops, Programming Contest and New Researchers Symposium.

QAs.question: Where and when is the 'HILDA' event taking place on June 18, 2023?
QAs.answer: The 'HILDA' event is taking place at the location 'Evergreen BC' from 8:30 to 10:30, 11:00 to 12:30 and 13:30 to 15:00.

QAs.question: What is the time and location of Tutorial 9: Disaggregated Database Systems in SIGMOD2023 program?
QAs.answer: The time is Friday June 23 11:00 am – 12:30 pm and location is Cedar B

QAs.question: What papers will be presented in Demo Sessions Group A at SIGMOD2023?
QAs.answer: The papers are 'Proactively Screening Machine Learning Pipelines with ArgusEyes', 'PyNKDV: An Efficient Network Kernel Density Visualization Library for Geospatial Analytic Systems', 'ARENA: Alternative Relational Query Plan Exploration for Database Education', 'Pay “Attention” to Chart Images for What You Read on Text', Demonstrating MATE and COCOA for Data Discovery', 'Demonstration of Geyser: Provenance Extraction and Applications over Data Science Scripts', 'SMILE: A Cost-Effective System for Serving Massive Pretrained Language Models in the Cloud', 'Demonstrating NaturalMiner: Searching Large Data Sets for Abstract Patterns Described in Natural Language', 'Characterizing and Verifying Queries Via CInsGen', 'CoWrangler: Recommender System for Data-Wrangling Scripts', 'SHACTOR: Improving the Quality of Large-Scale Knowledge Graphs with Validating Shapes', 'Fast Natural Language Based Data Exploration with Samples', 'ATENA-PRO: Generating Personalized Exploration Notebooks with Constrained Reinforcement Learning', 'Demonstration of ThalamusDB: Answering Complex SQL Queries with Natural Language Predicates on Multi-Modal Data'

QAs.question: What are the themes of the keynotes at the SIGMOD2023 conference?
QAs.answer: The themes are 'Mixed Methods Machine Learning', '49 Years of Queries', and 'DEI Perspectives in Information Technology Education'

QAs.question: Who are the 2023 SIGMOD General Co-chairs?
QAs.answer: The 2023 SIGMOD General Co-chairs are Sudipto Das and Ippokratis Pandis.

QAs.question: Who are the co-chairs and members of the SIGMOD 2023 Doctoral Dissertation Award committee?
QAs.answer: The co-chairs are Wolfgang Lehner (TU Dresden, Germany) and Gustavo Alonso (ETHZ, Switzerland). The committee members are Azza Abouzied (NYU Abu-Dhabi, United Arab Emirates), Daniel Deutch (Tel Aviv University, Israel), Evaggelia Pitoura (University of Ioannina, Greece), Xiaofang Zhou (HKUST), Huanchen Zhang(2021 winner) (Tsinghua University, China), and Chenggang Wu(2021 winner) (Aqueduct, USA).
QAs.from: SIGMOD2023>>Calls For Submissions>>SIGMOD call for Doctoral Dissertation Award>>Award Committee
